column4: I have partition that claims its full (i did a du -h ) but there should be nearly 15Gb free. Trash is empty. i can't figure out why its full reporting its full but its not. It is also being shared via NFS & i was deleting/copying files remotely i think it has to do with this...
Stale file handles, if you deleted something that's a process is hoding open.
how can i clear that out!
Figure out what's being held open via LSOF? :-)
